Quotes.author: Thomas Edison
Quotes.content: As a cure for worrying, work is better than whisky.

Quotes.author: Thomas Edison
Quotes.content: Everything comes to him who hustles while he waits.

Quotes.author: Thomas Edison
Quotes.content: I never did a day's work in my life.  It was all fun.

Quotes.author: Charles Dickens
Quotes.content: I do not know the American gentleman, god forgive me for putting two such words together.

Quotes.author: Charles Dickens
Quotes.content: We need never be ashamed of our tears.

Quotes.author: Charles Dickens
Quotes.content: Minds, like bodies, will often fall into a pimpled, ill-conditioned state from mere excess of comfort.

Quotes.author: Charles Dickens
Quotes.content: Train up a fig tree in the way it should go, and when you are old sit under the shade of it.

Quotes.author: Charles Dickens
Quotes.content: Subdue your appetites, my dears, and you've conquered human nature.

Quotes.author: Thomas Edison
Quotes.content: Faith, as well intentioned as it may be, must be built on facts, not fiction--faith in fiction is a damnable false hope.

Quotes.author: Thomas Edison
Quotes.content: There is no expedient to which a man will not go to avoid the labor of thinking.

Quotes.author: Charles Dickens
Quotes.content: No one is useless in this world who lightens the burdens of another.

Quotes.author: Thomas Edison
Quotes.content: Results! Why, man, I have gotten a lot of results. I know several thousand things that won't work.

Quotes.author: Charles Dickens
Quotes.content: Reflect on your present blessings, of which every man has many; not on your past misfortunes, of which all men have some.

Quotes.author: Thomas Edison
Quotes.content: Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.

Quotes.author: Thomas Edison
Quotes.content: The doctor of the future will give no medicine, but will interest her or his patients in the care of the human frame, in a proper diet, and in the cause and prevention of disease.

Quotes.author: Thomas Edison
Quotes.content: We don't know a millionth of one percent about anything.

Quotes.author: Thomas Edison
Quotes.content: If we all did the things we are capable of doing, we would literally astound ourselves.

Quotes.author: Thomas Edison
Quotes.content: To invent, you need a good imagination and a pile of junk.

Quotes.author: Thomas Edison
Quotes.content: I never did anything worth doing by accident, nor did any of my inventions come by accident

Quotes.author: Thomas Edison
Quotes.content: Hell, there are no rules here-- we're trying to accomplish something.

Quotes.author: Thomas Edison
Quotes.content: If we all did the things we are capable of doing, we would literally astound ourselves.

Quotes.author: Thomas Edison
Quotes.content: Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.

Quotes.author: Albert Einstein
Quotes.content: Only two things are infinite, the universe and human stupidity, and I'm not sure about the former.

Quotes.author: Albert Einstein
Quotes.content: Few people are capable of expressing with equanimity opinions which differ from the prejudices of their social environment. Most people are even incapable of forming such opinions.

Quotes.author: Albert Einstein
Quotes.content: If you are out to describe the truth, leave elegance to the tailor.

Quotes.author: Albert Einstein
Quotes.content: Before God we are all equally wise - and equally foolish.

Quotes.author: Albert Einstein
Quotes.content: Ethical axioms are found and tested not very differently from the axioms of science. Truth is what stands the test of experience.

Quotes.author: Albert Einstein
Quotes.content: Imagination is more important than knowledge...

Quotes.author: Albert Einstein
Quotes.content: Do not worry about your difficulties in Mathematics. I can assure you mine are still greater.

Quotes.author: Albert Einstein
Quotes.content: It is a miracle that curiosity survives formal education.

Quotes.author: Albert Einstein
Quotes.content: The ideals which have lighted my way, and time after time have given me new courage to face life cheerfully, have been Kindness, Beauty, and Truth. The trite subjects of human efforts, possessions, outward success, luxury have always seemed to me contemptible.

Quotes.author: Albert Einstein
Quotes.content: Laws alone can not secure freedom of expression; in order that every man present his views without penalty there must be spirit of tolerance in the entire population.

Quotes.author: Albert Einstein
Quotes.content: I never think of the future - it comes soon enough.

Quotes.author: Albert Einstein
Quotes.content: Every day I remind myself that my inner and outer life are based on the labors of other men, living and dead, and that I must exert myself in order to give in the same measure as I have received and am still receiving.

Quotes.author: Albert Einstein
Quotes.content: It is the supreme art of the teacher to awaken joy in creative expression and knowledge.

Quotes.author: Albert Einstein
Quotes.content: Reading, after a certain age, diverts the mind too much from its creative pursuits. Any man who reads too much and uses his own brain too little falls into lazy habits of thinking.

Quotes.author: Albert Einstein
Quotes.content: Gravitation cannot be held responsible for people falling in love. How on earth can you explain in terms of chemistry and physics so important a biological phenomenon as first love? Put your hand on a stove for a minute and it seems like an hour. Sit with that special girl for an hour and it seems like a minute. That's relativity.

Quotes.author: Albert Einstein
Quotes.content: If I had only known, I would have been a locksmith.

Quotes.author: Albert Einstein
Quotes.content: I never teach my pupils. I only attempt to provide the conditions in which they can learn.

Quotes.author: Albert Einstein
Quotes.content: I know not with what weapons World War III will be fought, but World War IV will be fought with sticks and stones.

Quotes.author: Albert Einstein
Quotes.content: Gravitation cannot be held responsible for people falling in love. How on earth can you explain in terms of chemistry and physics so important a biological phenomenon as first love? Put your hand on a stove for a minute and it seems like an hour. Sit with that special girl for an hour and it seems like a minute. That's relativity.

Quotes.author: Albert Einstein
Quotes.content: Perfection of means and confusion of ends seems to characterize our age.

Quotes.author: Aesop
Quotes.content: Beware lest you lose the substance by grasping at the shadow.

Quotes.author: Aesop
Quotes.content: Be content with your lot; one cannot be first in everything.

Quotes.author: Aesop
Quotes.content: The smaller the mind the greater the conceit.

Quotes.author: Warren Buffett
Quotes.content: Price is what you pay. Value is what you get.

Quotes.author: Warren Buffett
Quotes.content: The only time to buy these is on a day with no 'y' in it.

Quotes.author: Warren Buffett
Quotes.content: I won't close down a business of subnormal profitability merely to add a fraction of a point to our corporate returns. I also feel it inappropriate for even an exceptionally profitable company to fund an operation once it appears to have unending losses in prospect. Adam Smith would disagree with my first proposition and Karl Marx would disagree with my second; the middle ground is the only position that leaves me comfortable.

Quotes.author: Warren Buffett
Quotes.content: Most people get interested in stocks when everyone else is. The time to get interested is when no one else is. You can't buy what is popular and do well.

Quotes.author: Warren Buffett
Quotes.content: If you have a harem of 40 women, you never get to know any of them very well.

Quotes.author: Warren Buffett
Quotes.content: I don't look to jump over 7-foot bars; I look around for 1-foot bars that I can step over.

Quotes.author: Aesop
Quotes.content: Persuasion is often more effectual than force.

Quotes.author: Aesop
Quotes.content: It is easy to be brave from a safe distance.

Quotes.author: Warren Buffett
Quotes.content: It's only when the tide goes out that you discover who's been swimming naked.

Quotes.author: Warren Buffett
Quotes.content: In the business world, the rearview mirror is always clearer than the windshield.

Quotes.author: Aesop
Quotes.content: Injuries may be forgiven, but not forgotten.

Quotes.author: Aesop
Quotes.content: Better be wise by the misfortunes of others than by your own.

Quotes.author: Aesop
Quotes.content: It is with our passions, as it is with fire and water, they are good servants but bad masters.

Quotes.author: Warren Buffett
Quotes.content: I violated the Noah rule: Predicting rain doesn't count; building arks does.

Quotes.author: The Buddha
Quotes.content: Should you find a wise critic to point out your faults, follow him as you would a guide to hidden treasure.

Quotes.content: 'As I am, so are these. As are these, so am I.' Drawing the parallel to yourself, neither kill nor get others to kill.

Quotes.content: All experiences are preceded by mind, having mind as their master, created by mind.

Quotes.content: One is not called noble who harms living beings. By not harming living beings one is called noble.

Quotes.content: We will develop and cultivate the liberation of mind by lovingkindness, make it our vehicle, make it our basis, stabilize it, exercise ourselves in it, and fully perfect it.

Quotes.author: The Buddha

Quotes.content: They blame those who remain silent, they blame those who speak much, they blame those who speak in moderation. There is none in the world who is not blamed.

Quotes.content: Better than a thousand useless words is one useful word, upon hearing which one attains peace.

Quotes.author: The Buddha

Quotes.content: Purity and impurity depend on oneself; no one can purify another.

Quotes.content: Whoever doesn't flare up at someone who's angry wins a battle hard to win.

Quotes.author: Elon Musk
Quotes.content: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.

Quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce
Quotes.content: The gambling known as business looks with austere disfavor upon the business known as gambling.

Quotes.author: Michael Jordan
Quotes.content: I've missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. 26 times, I've been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.

Quotes.author: Erma Bombeck
Quotes.content: If a man watches three football games in a row, he should be declared legally dead.

Quotes.author: Barry Switzer
Quotes.content: Some people are born on third base and go through life thinking they hit a triple.

Quotes.author: Kyle Chandler
Quotes.content: Opportunity does not knock, it presents itself when you beat down the door.

Quotes.author: Leo Rosten
Quotes.content: First-rate people hire first-rate people; second-rate people hire third-rate people.

Quotes.author: Casey Stengel
Quotes.content: Finding good players is easy. Getting them to play as a team is another story.

Quotes.author: Bob Feller
Quotes.content: Every day is a new opportunity. You can build on yesterday's success or put its failures behind and start over again. That's the way life is, with a new game every day, and that's the way baseball is.

Quotes.author: Napoleon Hill
Quotes.content: Effort only fully releases its reward after a person refuses to quit.

Quotes.author: H. G. Wells
Quotes.content: If you fell down yesterday, stand up today.

Quotes.author: Michael Phelps
Quotes.content: You can't put a limit on anything. The more you dream, the farther you get.

Quotes.author: Henry Ford
Quotes.content: A business that makes nothing but money is a poor business.

Quotes.author: George S. Patton
Quotes.content: A good plan violently executed now is better than a perfect plan executed next week.

Quotes.author: Ian Botham
Quotes.content: To me, it doesn't matter how good you are. Sport is all about playing and competing. Whatever you do in cricket and in sport, enjoy it, be positive and try to win.

Quotes.author: Ralph Marston
Quotes.content: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.

Quotes.author: Elon Musk
Quotes.content: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.

Quotes.author: Warren Bennis

Quotes.author: William Blake

Quotes.author: Ayn Rand

Quotes.author: Robert Griffin III

Quotes.author: Robert Schuller

Quotes.author: Babe Ruth
Quotes.content: The way a team plays as a whole determines its success. You may have the greatest bunch of individual stars in the world, but if they don't play together, the club won't be worth a dime.

Quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau
Quotes.content: Many men go fishing all of their lives without knowing that it is not fish they are after.

Quotes.author: Jack Welch
Quotes.content: An organization's ability to learn, and translate that learning into action rapidly, is the ultimate competitive advantage.

Quotes.author: Don Marquis
Quotes.content: Ideas pull the trigger, but instinct loads the gun.

Quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson
Quotes.content: I hope we shall crush in its birth the aristocracy of our monied corporations which dare already to challenge our government to a trial by strength, and bid defiance to the laws of our country.

Quotes.author: Eric Liddell
Quotes.content: God made me fast. And when I run, I feel His pleasure.

Quotes.content: The secret of business is to know something that nobody else knows.
